reviewText: won't play in my Blu-ray player

This show was wonderful! I have always loved elephants! I wanted to send it to Barron Trump to watch with the President!! Great bonding time for family!!! A beautiful insight into the wild elephants...a reason to conserve these wonderful animals currently on the endangered list!

I loved following the different groups of elephants seasonally through Africa.  The film footage and narrative was beautiful and informative.  As per another viewer, I too will keep watching for this to be released.

Too bad this isn't currently available.  If you or someone you know loves elephants, this is the most beautiful look into how they think, love, and live.  Very well done.  I'll keep looking for it though!
